content.rendered:
Play JustFall in a Web Browser

JustFall.LOL is a free online multiplayer battle royale game that you can play.
In this game you can compete with other online players. Like Squid Game, you have to be the last penguin to survive without falling off the hexagon.

JustFall is an Online 1v1 Fighting Game

This game has simple rules. You need to use the arrow keys to move, jump and slide to play with the cute penguin. In addition, you can choose 1 color from 12 different colors to decorate your character’s skin and different game modes.

To start the game, choose the color of your character and fill in its name. Play with other players around the world and try not to fall off the platforms. Whoever remains the last penguin standing wins. Fight other players while using running and jumping around. You can also create a private server where you can play with your friends. So come on, let’s play!

  • You can Play This Game on Android or iPhone

JustFall.LOL – Multiplayer Onl – Unblocked Games

In each game you randomly compete with another player or invite your friends to form a group of 8 people. Your task is to control the penguin and keep it on the ice as long as possible. Icebergs will fall after people walk on them. It is better to stay away from the holes. Be the last person to fall into the sea to put your name on the leaderboard.
Stay away from holes if possible. Be the last person to fall in the water and your name will appear on the leaderboard.

How do you play justfall?

You have to rotate the whole hexagon as fast as possible and try not to fall. Floor tiles will sink when jumping or moving without stopping. There are 3 levels of height in this multiplayer penguins game.

What is Penguin Fall Guys?

Players play as penguins and compete in hexagonal arenas to see who can win the race. This game has simple rules. You need to use the arrow keys to move, jump and slide to play with the cute penguin.

Is Fall Guys based on Squid?

Fall Guys feels inspired by Squid and wants to add a new game mode like Red Light, Green Light.
